sentence.Network_en: Although he is above 70, he runs like a redshank.
sentence.Network_cn: 虽然他已年逾70, 但走起路来很快.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 2013年8月8日 - 生态: 海湾的干拓地, 沼泽地, 潭, 湖, 内陆的水边生活, 春秋移动的时候混在红脚鹬(REDSHANK)群在湿地觅食.  声音: 移动的时候叫 BI-YU BI-YU.
redscarf 红巾, redshank 赤足鹬, redseaweed 红海藻

means.word_mean: 1. a common Old World wading bird with long red legs

auth_sentence.content: The Dyfi estuary is also one of the few strongholds for breeding lapwing and redshank in Wales.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Dyfi estuary is also one of the few strongholds for breeding lapwing and redshank in Wales.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Dyfi estuary is also one of the few strongholds for breeding lapwing and redshank in Wales.
